attributes.action: Prevent enforcement of school uniforms if temperatures exceed a certain level
attributes.additional_details:
Many students find it extremely difficult to concentrate and get work completed when it is too hot, especially when they are also required to wear a school uniform, which might not be suitable for hot weather.

The Government should make it so that schools cannot require their students to wear a full school uniform if temperatures exceed a certain level, to be set following consultation with the education sector and students.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to make it so that if temperatures rise above a certain level, Primary and Secondary School should not have to wear full school uniform.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Require schools to have appropriate uniform rules for hot weather:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639484
